courses.title: Java for beginners
courses.description: this is the most amazing course ever! I promise you gonna enjoy it so hard !
courses.author: Hourri Mohamed

chapters.title: title 1
chapters.content: 1 The sun beat down on the desert sands, casting long shadows behind the lone traveler as he trudged across the dunes. Sweat beaded on his forehead and his throat was parched from the hot, dry air. As he walked, he couldn't help but wonder if he was on the right path, or if he was hopelessly lost. In the distance, he could see the faint outline of a mountain range, and he wondered if that was where he was headed. But for now, all he could do was keep moving forward, one step at a time, and hope that he would find his way.
